name: Community College Immigration Services
description: Immigration Institute of the Bay Area (IIBA) offers free immigration legal services to students, staff and faculty affiliated with the California Community Colleges. IIBA offers a wide range of free immigration legal services and informative presentations to current students, staff, and faculty of the California Community Colleges.
fullDescription: Immigration Institute of the Bay Area (IIBA) offers free immigration legal services to students, staff and faculty affiliated with the California Community Colleges. IIBA offers a wide range of free immigration legal services and informative presentations to current students, staff, and faculty of the California Community Colleges.
whatTheyOffer: Immigration Institute of the Bay Area (IIBA) offers free immigration legal services to students, staff and faculty affiliated with the California Community Colleges. IIBA offers a wide range of free immigration legal services and informative presentations to current students, staff, and faculty of the California Community Colleges.
howToGetIt: Please schedule a free and confidential individual consultation with our legal team to explore possible immigration options: City College of San Francisco call 510-992-6583 College of San Mateo call 650-587-1502 Foothill College call 650-587-1502 Los Medanos College call 925-203-1098 Diablo Valley College call 925-203-1098 All Other Campuses call 925-237-8581 ext. 20 To book an appointment online visit: https://findyourally.com/
agency: Immigration Institute of the Bay Area
